data.name: Tenkiame / 天気雨
data.detailed_description:
Due to unforeseen circumstances, one comes from the big city to the peaceful countryside...
…and meets attractive girls there.
An innocent little girl named "Shiro", and…
...a quiet, yet mischievous older sister, "Kon".
The memories of one summer together with them.

Genre

Exciting Fox-Ears Adventure

Highlights

  • Featuring ears and tails that move in real time, using E-mote, to accent the attractiveness of the Fox-Girls!
  • A heartfelt story set in the summer countryside!

STORY

A sunny summer vacation…
I received a call that my grandfather was in bad health.
I felt a bit troubled.
But, in order to help out, as the only son of busy parents,
I went to stay at my grandparent's house.

Fortunately, the condition of my grandfather was not serious.
I spent a relaxing time catching up with my grandparents, after not seeing them for a long time.
My grandmother said that the nature here was threatened.
It seemed that massive urban development was just around the corner if I didn't take over the land.
At that time, my point of view was that it was simply a sign of the times, but…

I went out on the porch after hearing the sound of wind chimes...
…and it was a quiet, green, and pleasant place.
Despite being a hot summer, the wind was cool and clear, and I heard the gentle sound of the leaves rustling.

"The wind…so comfortable."

Then I noticed a little girl was there nearby in the sunshine.
Her seductive, beautiful hair was mountain-shaped…due to her ears.

I was fascinated by the girl's smile in front of me and the whispers of nature...

An innocent and curious fox, "Shiro", and the modest fox taking care of everyone, "Kon".
In this way, our little love story begins…

data.short_description: Due to unforeseen circumstances, one comes from the big city to the peaceful countryside... …and meets attractive girls there. An innocent little girl named "Shiro", and… ...a quiet, yet mischievous older sister, "Kon". The memories of one summer together with them.

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低:
  • OS: windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • プロセッサー: Core i3
  • メモリー: 1 GB RAM
  • グラフィック: VRAM 128MB, Resolution 720p
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • ストレージ: 4 GB 利用可能
  • サウンドカード: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
推奨:
  • OS: windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • プロセッサー: Core i5
  • メモリー: 4 GB RAM
  • グラフィック: VRAM 512MB, Resolution 1080p
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • ストレージ: 4 GB 利用可能
  • サウンドカード: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers

content_descriptors.notes:
The content of Tenkiame contains explicit depictions of sexual acts and nudity, as well as language and is intended for adults only.
They seem to be not human beings, but players will deepen sexual interactions with them along the story.
With a slow growing love, she can agree and have sex.
It is very pretty and beautiful.
All characters appearing in Tenkiame are set to be over 18 years of age.
